00051 inline
00052 DGtal::Trace::Trace(DGtal::TraceWriter &writer):  myCurrentLevel(0), myCurrentPrefix (""),  myWriter(writer)
00053 {
00054 }
00055 
00062 inline
00063 DGtal::Trace::~Trace()
00064 {
00065   myWriter.outputStream() << myWriter.postfixReset();
00066   while ( ! myClockStack.empty() )
00067     {
00068       delete myClockStack.top();
00069       myClockStack.pop();
00070     }
00071 }
00072

00078 inline
00079 void
00080 DGtal::Trace::selfDisplay( std::ostream & out ) const
00081 {
00082   out << "[Trace]";
00083 }

00089 inline
00090 bool
00091 DGtal::Trace::isValid() const
00092 {
00093   return true;
00094 }

00101 inline
00102 void
00103 DGtal::Trace::reset()
00104 {
00105   myCurrentLevel = 0;
00106   myCurrentPrefix = "";
00107   while( !myKeywordStack.empty() )
00108     {
00109       myKeywordStack.pop();
00110     }
00111 }
00112 
00118 inline
00119 void
00120 DGtal::Trace::beginBlock(const std::string &keyword)
00121 {
00122   myWriter.outputStream()<< myCurrentPrefix 
00123        << myWriter.prefixEmphase()
00124        << "New Block ["<<keyword << "]"
00125        << myWriter.postfixReset()
00126        <<std::endl;
00127   myCurrentLevel++;
00128   myCurrentPrefix += TRACE_PATTERN;
00129   myKeywordStack.push(keyword);
00130 
00131   //Block timer start
00132   Clock *c = new(Clock);
00133   c->startClock();
00134   myClockStack.push(c);
00135 }
00136 
00144 inline long
00145 DGtal::Trace::endBlock()
00146 {
00147   long tick;
00148   Clock *localClock;
00149 
00150   ASSERT (myCurrentLevel >0);
00151   
00152   myCurrentLevel--;
00153   myCurrentPrefix = "";
00154   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < myCurrentLevel; i++)
00155     myCurrentPrefix += TRACE_PATTERN;
00156   localClock =  myClockStack.top();
00157   tick = localClock->stopClock();
00158 
00159   myWriter.outputStream() << myCurrentPrefix 
00160         << myWriter.prefixEmphase() 
00161         << "EndBlock [" << myKeywordStack.top()
00162         << "] (" << tick<<" ms)"
00163         << myWriter.postfixReset()<< std::endl;
00164   myKeywordStack.pop();
00165   myClockStack.pop();
00166   delete localClock;
00167   return tick;
00168 }
00169 
00175 inline std::ostream &
00176 DGtal::Trace::warning() const
00177 {
00178   myWriter.outputStream() <<  myCurrentPrefix << myWriter.prefixWarning();
00179   return  myWriter.outputStream();
00180 }

00189 DGtal::Trace::error() const
00190 {
00191   myWriter.outputStream() <<  myCurrentPrefix << myWriter.prefixError();
00192   return  myWriter.outputStream();
00193 }

00202 DGtal::Trace::emphase() const

00204   myWriter.outputStream() <<  myCurrentPrefix << myWriter.prefixEmphase();
00205   return  myWriter.outputStream();

00212 inline std::ostream &
00213 DGtal::Trace::info() const
00214 {
00215    myWriter.outputStream() <<  myCurrentPrefix << myWriter.prefixInfo();
00216   return  myWriter.outputStream();
00217 }
